name: metahkg
description: Metahkg is a free and open source lihkg-style forum.

scripts.deploy: cd metahkg-server && yarn run deploy & cd metahkg-web && yarn run deploy
scripts.docker:prebuilt: cd docker && docker-compose -f docker-compose-prebuilt.yml pull --ignore-pull-failures && docker-compose -f docker-compose-prebuilt.yml up -d --build
scripts.clean:docker: docker images -a | grep '<none>' | awk '{print $3}' | xargs docker rmi

author: wcyat
